name: South Beach
description: Known for its vibrant nightlife, beautiful art deco architecture, and pristine sandy beaches. A must-see destination for tourists and locals alike.

name: Wynwood Walls
description: An outdoor museum showcasing large-scale street art from some of the world's best-known muralists. A hub for creativity and culture in Miami.

name: Little Havana
address: Calle Ocho, SW 8th Street, Miami, FL
description: A vibrant neighborhood and a hub of Cuban culture. Stroll through the streets, enjoy authentic food, and watch people playing dominoes at Maximo Gomez Park.

name: Vizcaya Museum & Gardens
description: A beautiful European-style estate on Biscayne Bay with stunning architecture, lush gardens, and ornate interiors. A perfect spot for a peaceful escape.

name: Perez Art Museum Miami (PAMM)
description: A modern and contemporary art museum located in Museum Park, offering breathtaking views of Biscayne Bay and a wide range of international art.

name: Everglades National Park
description: A vast and diverse subtropical wilderness that is home to alligators, panthers, and a variety of birds. A unique natural wonder just a short drive from the city.

name: Bayside Marketplace
description: An outdoor festival marketplace with a variety of shops, restaurants, and entertainment options. A great place to enjoy the waterfront and live music.

name: Phillip and Patricia Frost Museum
description: A leading science museum with a planetarium and aquarium. Features interactive exhibits and educational programs for all ages.
